description.p: While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. In addition, the creature has advantage on attack rolls against Beasts.
The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

sheet.description: You can infuse a dagger into a +1 dagger with advantage on attack rolls against Beasts.
You can infuse a dagger into a +2 dagger with advantage on attack rolls against Beasts.

description.p: A creature proficient with musical instrum1ents can use an action to begin playing a tune from the horn for up to 1 minute. For each round the creature maintains this action, it builds up a charge. At the end of the minute or when the creature uses its action for a different purpose, it creates food and water, as if by the create food and water, for a number of creatures equal to its accumulated charges and the horn becomes a nonmagical instrument until the next dawn, at which point it can be used again.

description.p: As an action, a creature in possession of this infusion can activate it to cast unseen servant. When the servant appears, it appears with a mess kit and cook's utensils. Unless commanded otherwise with a bonus action, the servant uses its action to cook meals with any available rations, food, or raw materials available to it.
